function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to increased collaboration and reliance on diversified suppliers and manufacturers.","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases in workplaces and jobsites.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, regular testing, and vaccination programs. Encourage remote collaboration where possible.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and automation for reduced physical contact.","People":"Construction practitioners, workers, suppliers, manufacturers, and other project stakeholders.","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, and industry regulators."},{"Description":"Labor shortage and increase in unemployment levels leading to overcrowded workplaces and job sites.","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission due to overcrowding and inadequate physical distancing.","Mitigation":"Invest in automation and robotics to reduce the reliance on a large workforce. Implement staggered work schedules and remote working options.","Technologies":"Robotics, AI, and remote collaboration tools.","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and site supervisors.","Owner":"Construction companies, industry associations, and government bodies."},{"Description":"New research streams related to workforce-related issues, project and workplace considerations, procurement and supply chain implications, and contractual, legal, and insurance aspects.","Impact":"Lack of preparedness for future pandemics and health crises in the construction industry.","Mitigation":"Invest in research and development to address these emerging areas. Develop new protocols and best practices based on research findings.","Technologies":"Data analytics, AI, and advanced research tools.","People":"Construction researchers, industry associations, and government agencies.","Owner":"Research institutions, industry organizations, and government bodies."}]}
